Package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb

Interface Summary
Database Describes the operations that are used by the Mojos to launch in-memory databases, load data into, execute scripts against or shutdown the database.
Loader  
Logger  
 

Class Summary
AbstractDatabase Abstract base classes for database objects providing an implentation of the load() operation that is used to load data into or execute scripts against the database.
AbstractInMemDBMojo Abstract base class for all the In Memory Database plug-in's Mojos.
DatabaseFactory The factory that creates database objects.
StartInMemDBMojo This plug-in Mojo starts an In Memory Database.
StopInMemDBMojo This plug-in Mojo stops an In Memory Database.
